name: Burnt Dirt Expansion
description:
The finale of Hopeful, a desolate mountainside where the worst of the worst make their home. The lovelies carve a path of blood with the girl right in front of them, and nothing will stop them. The local gang didn't stand a chance. But Beltboy who was right behind them, intends on stopping them. For revenge, and for friendship. Experience a new finale and new faces, impossible odds and a new story. 

- Beltboy's entire moveset is immediately available, with endgame combat that requires thought and consideration of all your skills.

- New dialogue and new faces! Expect the unexpected.

- Multiple endings!

Credits: In Game
